title: 820-3228-B - bios file
message:
Customer shut down Mac on firmware update. The MacMini's LED flashes fast about 5 times and then stays on. But without chime or video.

I can't find a BIOS file for this mode. Someone has?

title: 820-3228-B - bios file
message:
Try these and comment if any good...

title: 820-3228-B - bios file
message:
Perfect!  I will test and give feedback!
 
I tried with a file that I managed, the Mac turned on again, but when it restarts, it doesn't come back! need to turn off the button and turn it on again!

title: 820-3228-B - bios file
message: I tested both bios. Mac Mini keeps restarting, chime and in a few seconds, restarts.

title: 820-3228-B - bios file
message:
I don't remember where I got these files from.
If you see other files on Internet (even on paid forums) let me know.

title: 820-3228-B - bios file
message: Googling, I learned how to get the EFI file out of the macOs installer!  I found out that this macmini 6.2 has no EFI file!  so i got file from 6.1 (820-3227), mac turned on, but same problem when restarting!
